definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)

sentences.chinese: 我是个地地道道的羽毛球迷。

sentences.english: Originally, the old woman was an out-and-out flower-lover.
sentences.chinese: 原来，老人是一个地地道道的爱花人。
他们是地地道道的垃圾。

sentences.english: He is british to the backbone .
sentences.chinese: 他是地地道道的英国人。
